mapper.select: select ( select ts.sname from tbltrashin tts LEFT JOIN tblmedicaltype tmt on tmt.infoid = tts.infoid left join tblstaff ts on tmt.collectid = ts.staffid where tts.enterdate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} order by tts.enterdate desc limit 0,1 )as collectName, ( select ts.sname from tbltrashin tts LEFT JOIN tblmedicaltype tmt on tmt.infoid = tts.infoid left join tblstaff ts on tts.enterid = ts.staffid where tts.enterdate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} order by tts.enterdate desc limit 0,1 ) as enterName, tts.enterdate inDate from tbltrashin tts LEFT JOIN tblmedicaltype tmt on tmt.infoid = tts.infoid where tts.enterdate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} group by tts.enterdate order by tts.enterdate desc limit 0,1
